data.text: @alexmaccaroon @JamesDelingpole Thats been the plan all along... They will have their safe little bunkers...

@alexmaccaroon @zero_to_here_oh Are there any journalists left capable of processing this situation with a cool head or would Dan Hodges rather have a nuclear bomb land in his back garden than give in to ‘Mr Nasty’? The media are clueless. Please stay out of this if you just want to throw mud.
@alexmaccaroon @zero_to_here_oh It's not just him if this is correct.https://t.co/rgj8TT4GDH
@alexmaccaroon His virtue brackets will protect him from the fall-out, evidently.
